org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer

Interface TransportLayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public interface TransportLayer
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The MBus transport layer interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the transport layer.
      java.io.DataInputStream getInputStream()
      Get the input stream of the layer.
      java.io.DataOutputStream getOutputStream()
      Get the output stream of the layer.
      int getTimeout()
      Get the response timeout in MILLIS.
      boolean isClosed()
      Check if the layer is open.
      void open()
      Opens the transport layer.
      void setTimeout(int timeout)
      Set the response timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
   throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the transport layer. The layer needs to be opened before attempting to read a device.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while opening.

        Check if the layer is open.
        Returns:
